text: Cast all your anxieties on Him, for He cares for you.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
I love You, O Lord, and for Your sake, I love my neighbor as myself.
Cast your burden on the Lord, and He will sustain you.
Trust in Him at all times, you people; pour out your hearts to Him, for God is our refuge.
Love the Lord, your God, with all your heart, and with all your soul, and with all your strength.
When the cares of my heart are many, Your consolations cheer my soul.
In God, whose word I praise, in God I trust; I shall not be afraid
Love comes from God. Everyone who loves has been born of God and knows God.
